channel.title: Major frame drop/stutter issues
channel.description:
certain places experiencing stuttering and huge drop in frame rate
noticed in task manager seems to be a CPU issue i noticed multi-core rendering option cant be changed but i tried changed threw dev console but didn't seem to help (not sure if this method actually enabled or not)
CPU 980x@4.6ghz Video 2 480SLI 120hz monitor
Max settings frame capped at 120 dip to low 60 without frame cap goes up to 300 fps and drops to low 60
things i tried disabled hyper threading set hl2.exe process priory to high messed with CPU affinity set pre rendered frame to 1 different video drivers disabled SLI
nothing is working
